entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Oakville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burlington Lift Bridge 08:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 71 %

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Snow at times heavy or ice pellets beginning late this afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain. Local ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
